qas.question: What rating did Ars Technica initially give PlayStation 3?
What PS3 competitor won IGN's "Console Showdown" in 2010?
What PC Mag. staffer picked PS3 over Xbox in June, 2012?
Which publication called the PlayStation 3 "a brilliant games console"?
Where did IGN place the PS3 on their 2009 list of the best video game consoles ever?
What rating did Ars Technica initially give PlayStation 4?
What PS3 competitor won IGN's "Console Showdown" in 2011?
What PC Mag. staffer picked PS3 over Xbox in June, 2010?
Which publication called the PlayStation 2 "a brilliant games console"?
Where did IGN place the PS3 on their 2011 list of the best video game consoles ever?

context: Critical and commercial reception to PS3 improved over time, after a series of price revisions, Blu-ray's victory over HD DVD, and the release of several well received titles. Ars Technica's original launch review gave PS3 only a <a0_0><b5_0>6/10<b5_0/><a0_0/>, but second review of the console in June 2008 rated it a 9/10. In September 2009, IGN named PlayStation 3 the <a4_0><b9_0>15th<b9_0/><a4_0/> best gaming console of all time, behind both of its competitors: Wii (10th) and Xbox 360 (6th). However, PS3 has won IGN's "Console Showdown"—based on which console offers the best selection of games released during each year—in three of the four years since it began (2008, 2009 and 2011, with <a1_0><b6_0>Xbox<b6_0/><a1_0/> winning in 2010). IGN judged PlayStation 3 to have the best game line-up of 2008, based on their review scores in comparison to those of Wii and Xbox 360. In a comparison piece by PC mag's <a2_0><b7_0>Will Greenwald<b7_0/><a2_0/> in June 2012, PS3 was selected as an overall better console compared to Xbox 360. <a3_0><b8_0>Pocket-lint<b8_0/><a3_0/> said of the console "The PS3 has always been a brilliant games console," and that "For now, this is just about the best media device for the money."
